attributes.action: Keep the Current Age Limit On Driving A motor Car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today (19th July 2007) new legaslation has been proposes to increase the legal age of driving to 18. This is highly unfair to young people assuming that they are going to be bad drivers. The age should be kept at 17 but futher driving training could possibly become nessasary in order to gain a full driving lisence.
